name: Agua √â Coco Bar & Grill
address: 3132 E Tremont Ave, Bronx, NY 10461, USA

reviews.text: the vibes are good in terms of the music but the service is always slow and the absolute worst. had to hawk down my server every time, they all just sit and hang out instead of making sure your table has everything.
My kids and I were beyond satisfied , Jonathan was great , the overall experience gets a be 10/10, we‚Äôll definitely be back !
Went here for halloween and the place was a good vibe the music was on point and the food was so so good! I would be going again!
My favorite place. Hookah is the best! Jonathan & Lana are amazing. Ali is the best as well.
Yenni is the best bartender ever she made my drinks so good with such a good attitude all night she‚Äôs funny lit and so much fun
Jennifer was the best bartender with good customer service. She is the best at the event for the baby shower today. She need a raise.
The world‚Äôs best dj is here today dj Alex da kid !!! Great. Delicious food !
Great vibe, awesome service & they played everything!
great food great drinks the owner Ali is amazing !! definitely recommend!!
Drinks were good food good but service is very hit or miss
I visited on Saturday. The drinks were decent, but the hookah was good.

The food is amazing. The place is beautiful and has tons of space.

Everyone is there to enjoy themselves and the workers is on point attending to everyone.

You also want to be here for any sporting event whether football, basketball, boxing or Ufc.

Make your way here for some great vibes!!!!
Amazing service!!!! Jenny is the best!
Awesome spot for happy hour and good vibes‚Ä¶.check out Jenny, best bartender in East Tremont!
Food is great  . Love my bartender she is amazing. Say what's up to Yenni  she is the best.
Good food and amazing service
Beat calamari in the bronx ,vibes are always on point and a big screen for sports
I‚Äôve been here for brunch on Sundays and the food and drinks are really good. They also have karaoke which is great because I love to sing lol so be sure to check it out if you‚Äôre in the area.

Careful when you order you drink. They say it's a certain bottle and they mix with cheaper brands. I had ordered whisky top shelf and on my thrid pour they changed up thinking I wouldn't notice. They tried to make it up. But too late. I left with a bad taste. Plus the good is simple. Not out if this world.

Every time I visit it‚Äôs a good time. Never had an issue with food or drinks. I went for the live stream of the bad bunny residency concert and it was an absolutely amazing time. Will definitely go again. Agua is becoming a regular spot for me.
The food, the drinks, the SERVICE even the hookah was great! Great spot for chill vibes. Great music and great energy. Highly recommend coming here.
FOOD, HOOKAH, AND DRINKS are AMAZING. I really recommended this place.

I had the absolute pleasure of being served by Jennifer, and she is truly one of the best bartenders I‚Äôve ever encountered. Not only is she incredibly skilled at making perfectly balanced drinks, but her energy, professionalism, and warm personality made the entire experience unforgettable. She was attentive without being overbearing, knew exactly what to recommend, and created such a fun and welcoming atmosphere. Jennifer goes above and beyond to make sure we felt  taken care of, and it‚Äôs clear she genuinely loves what she does. If you‚Äôre lucky enough to have her as your bartender, you‚Äôre in for an amazing experience!

juned gave us the best experience ever
service was on point and treated us with so much patience and respect as it was our first time
will be coming back and recommend to anyone thinking of coming
Yenni, is amazing she is such a sweetheart. Very attentive to me and my group. The food is great along with the atmosphere. Ill for sure be coming back.
Super loud music. Cannot communicate with your partner.

I went to the brunch on the Sunday before Labor Day. The music was good until the karaoke. They started playing too many aunty sad song. I wouldn‚Äôt recommend the steak and eggs. The steak was so small. You‚Äôre better off getting the chicharron de pollo.

Agua e Coco me encant√≥ ! Yo vengo de Long Island y vuelvo de Nuevo ,la bebida, la comida AMAZING !! Mi bartender fue Yennifer y definitivamente ella fue top me qued√© desde casi el principio al fin y vuelvo m√°s por ella y por el DJ
Me encant√≥ ! 10/10

We decided to eat here after a horrible experience at another restaurant. The drinks and food were great as well as service. We ordered mofongo, paella and salmon. The tres leches dessert was amazing. They were very well presented and the flavors were great. I did not like the uncomfortable wooden chairs though. After sitting for two hours let‚Äôs just say my hips hurt until the next morning lol. Also, this is the third restaurant I go to in the Tremont area where there‚Äôs hookah service. It is very annoying when you have smoke being blown in your area when you are trying to enjoy your meal. They should have a section for it and/or offer it after a certain time. Safe to say these restaurants are not kid friendly anymore and more smoker friendly.
At was at Agua e coco on Friday night and Yenni was my Bartender

On Tuesday Yenni  La paraaaaa service was A1 ! A  vibe very attentive such an experience!.  Drinks were on point !    The hookah   Was immaculate the service was top notch!  Crystal our waitress  was also on point it was a great experience I will definitely return back !
This is the spottt they're so fun and nice here! And of course the food is good that goes without saying!
Yenni is the best waitress ever. The ambience and DJ are fantastic here.
Great spot. Amazing vibe. Jonathan was a great help. I will be coming back.
Yenni was the bartender.  She was also a great host. The drinks were amazing! I ordered the laugh now cry later drink. You won't be disappointed. I will be back for more.
The place atmosphere is really nice love the fact that the music is moderate so you can have a conversation and enjoy your drink. I came on Monday happy hour is all day as well as Wednesday
Excellent attention, the place very cozy the food very good!!!! Everything very clean
It was nice atmosphere, food was good and the drinks
Agua e Coco events it‚Äôs the BESTTT!! I was there with my family celebrating at sweet 16 and Yenni & Mariellys  was ten best

We were celebrating at sweet sixteen at Agua e coco Events and Yenni & Mariellys. They are event specialist with a knack for making feel people comfortable and special. They made our event amazing and would recommend them to any one who wants top notch service. Keep them in mine d next time your  are planning an event.
I had a great time at Agua e coco with Yenni and Marielly‚Äôs  they are the best they serve me and my family best bay ever!!!!!!!
Yenni and Mariellys at Agua e coco Events was so nice and lit I love them
Yenni at Agua e coco events
I was at Agua e Coco EVENTS  and Yenni the Bartender. She was the most considerate and berry respectful. She made the bar go by fast and that was appreciated. Thank you to YENNI!!!!!!.
Yenni she is was amazing, great bartender! Making sure my sister and I were well taken care of!
When I arrived at that place I felt so welcomed and Yennifer, the girl at the bar, served me and I truly felt at home. The DJ was very friendly and had good music. Everything was perfect.üëç

Agua E Coco event space is the best event space to do your parties.The space is very big and beautiful great lighting and service and setup. I will definitely recommend everyone to rent the space for all your parties.
Yenni was one of my bartender and she was by far amazing! she took care of me and my friend and made us feel welcomed! thank you Yenni‚ù§Ô∏è
Yenni was the best bartender ever. Super sweet and beautiful, definitely coming back for her and for her service <3
I enjoy watching events here. Great vibes and staff is very attentive. Cocktail favorite is definitely the Still not a player üòã

Our family and extended family were excited to try Agua √â Coco Bar & Grill, and they did not disappoint! With a group of 16 celebrating a special family member's birthday, we were treated to a truly memorable brunch experience.

The service was exceptional and made us feel right at home. The staff was attentive and made sure that we were comfortable.

The brunch menu featured a nice variety, but the salmon was the undeniable star of the show‚Äîmoist, flavorful, and seasoned to perfection!.

And let‚Äôs talk about the drinks! We savored every sip of their bottomless white and red sangria.

Agua √â Coco has officially earned a spot on my culinary must-try list! I can‚Äôt wait to return.

Yesterday 6/27/2025 was my first time. My friend and I went for happy hour. The food is delicious! We had shrimp tacos and wings. I can only imagine how good their big plates must be. I had a strawberry margarita and it was made sooo good. The atmosphere is such a vibe. The decor, the DJ! I will definitely will be coming back! I also left my lunch bag and called the next day to see if it was there. I spoke to Jonathan and he found it and held it for me until I came to pick it up.

Don‚Äôt come here unless you want to be cheated. Honestly they not about having loyal customers more like all about profit. Lets start with the appetizer had the guacamole and it had something else in it that took that taste guacamole taste away could be too much oil. Was not flavored only in some parts not every bite.  Me and my wife ordered steak asked for medium well and they burnt it not juicy at all. I ordered surf and turf and the shrimp was cold all 4 of them but I was starving so I still ate because at end of the day was cooked but that was horrible.  Now to the part where they taking the money.  The drinks are $18 a drink but they are serving juice. Ain‚Äôt no way that I order a drink that has Hennessy inside and the drink is still yellow and I drink so I can taste that no alcohol is inside.  We complain so much and the server did what he can do but at this point I truly believe the bartender was told to do the old trick that you add liquor to the more drinks they buy. We order 8 drinks in total and on the very last drink was the color changed smh. We looked up this spot to watch the game so of course I didn‚Äôt want to leave because it was all about my team but they don‚Äôt care about nothing but money and you can tell. The server was very nice again and sad that he has to work the way he did if they not going to provide him with what the customers asked for. All who follow my post know that I do not lie and I guess you will have to see for yourself. Hopefully after this post things will change but no way $18 should be paid for a drink that‚Äôs 99% juice until you order more. Receipt don‚Äôt like 8 drinks and still walked out with no buzz

This spot is definitely a must! Great food, great music & even better drinks especially when it‚Äôs made by the best bartender there named Yenniffer . She‚Äôs very polite attentive and very professional! Definitely tip worthy.

Cenylet is the best waitress I‚Äôve ever met I literally go there every time she calls and Anais is the best host Everrrr, Lil Rob always takes care of me as well, he runs the place amazing. Great service by them every time I go there. If they go I go wherever they go. Love the food, music and atmosphere. I recommend Aguas to everyone. üíØüíØüíØ

I had an amazing experience at Aqua √© Coco! From the moment I walked in, the atmosphere, food, and music were all on point. The vibe was relaxed and welcoming, making it the perfect spot to unwind and enjoy a great meal.

The food was absolutely delicious, with everything from the tacos to the calamari cooked to perfection. The flavors were spot-on, and you could tell they use quality ingredients.

What really stood out to me, though, was the incredible service. Ali, the general manager, truly cares about his customers. He made sure everyone was well taken care of and created an inviting atmosphere that made the experience even more special.

If you‚Äôre looking for a place with great food, music, and an overall fantastic vibe, Aqua √© Coco is the spot to go! Highly recommend it!
The bartender named Yennifer was phenomenal. She was always checking on me and my guest and super polite. If you are dining here and she is taking care of you, you won't be upset.

The food was delicious. While you get the drinks fairly quick, the food service (kitchen) is slow. However, the music, tvs and vibe in the place distract you from that.   The waitstaff are very pleasant and attentive. The atmosphere is vibrant, loud and lively.   The DJ on Friday plays a great mix of all music.  I will be going back.

Came here on 2 occasions. Both times me and my guest and I had a great time, and I had an even better time on Monday when the when Monday dj was playing. It was great music selection and great vibes from the dj. For me, it's going to be a regular Monday spot for me, place Is nicely decorated, nice decor, and would like it if they dim down lights a little way too bright (just a suggestion) the service is ok took a long time for the food and drinks, waiter was overwhelmed but julissa tried her best to keep up with the tables, definitely need more staff, bartender was great and served good drinks, food was amazing expect the Churrasco I'm steak person so it was definitely not it. But the burgers, tho, im will rate them burgers the best damn burgers in the bronx. As for the other food and appetizers, it was absolutely amazing. Despite the minor bumps in the road that can easily be fixed. This place is a gem. You must go and try it out. You won't be disappointed. See you guys next Monday. Is it Monday yet? Lol... will update the review in the future

Updated 5 star review

It was my first time here to celebrate my cousins 21st birthday on Tuesday, Jan 14 2025. We had a great time even though this wasn't the first choice. Carlos, our host, was fabulous!!! He was very accommodating even with all our wants n needs. The food portions were enough for our party of 18. The food was so good I had to purchase addt'l food to take home and based on what I saw in the bag it's a nice portion. The only one issue we had was that the chicken was cooked too hard, but it was good, tho lol. We'll definitely come back again.  Thank you, Carlos!!! üòä

‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è
Agua de Coco Bar is such a vibe! The atmosphere was perfect ‚Äî laid-back but lively, with great music and beautiful decor that gave it a tropical feel. The drinks were amazing (especially the coconut cocktails ‚Äî so fresh and flavorful), and the staff was super friendly and welcoming. You can tell they care about the experience. Whether you‚Äôre out for a chill night or a fun time with friends, this spot delivers. Highly recommend ‚Äî can‚Äôt wait to come back!

This place is definitely a vibe, I had to finally try some grub after following them on ig before their opening. I came in after errands in the area. I was impressed by the dipping sauce for the tostones. The chicken tacos were good for taco Tuesday. Next time, I want them a little bit warmer. Maybe they sat for a second longer than they should, but they were not  cold. The staff retrieved them. My drink was nice and strong, the staff ,,, very attentive , my server Rose was on point !!

Best place I‚Äôve been to in the Bronx (and I‚Äôm from
The Bronx) The food? AMAZING (get the shrimp mofongo) Drinks? SO good and most importantly the service? AMAZING! I‚Äôm a server at night so I‚Äôm very well aware of what it takes to give great service and my server Jonathan went above and beyond! Thank you for such a great experience, I will be back!

I've been here a few times and Yenni has been our bartender every single time. Her service is consistently wonderful. She's a great vibe,  truly knows how to go above and beyond for her guests. The drinks are always fantastic, my favorite is still Not a Playa.

The overall atmosphere is amazing, very welcoming and comfortable. I haven‚Äôt been for brunch yet but I‚Äôve heard great things and definitely plan to try it next time. Highly recommend this spot!

Originally I gave this place a bad review. After interacting with one of the owners. He assured me the service and food was better than before. He did not disappoint.. The service and food was top notch.. I‚Äôve been to about almost all the spots on this strip. Aqua e coco is again my number one go to. I will recommend the drink called ‚Äúsorry not sorry‚Äù‚Ä¶ I‚Äôm absolutely delighted by the new menu and drink menu‚Ä¶. For a great time In Throggs neck look no further.. Aqua e coco is the place to be, hands down..

Jennifer at Agua y Coco is truly a gem! Her attentive service and respectful demeanor create an inviting atmosphere that makes every visit feel special. She's incredibly informative and always goes the extra mile to ensure her clients have a fantastic experience. Whether you're looking for recommendations or just a friendly chat, Jennifer is always ready to engage and make your time memorable. Her enthusiasm and dedication to creating a great vibe are unmatched‚Äîshe's definitely the reason to return!

I swear, if it wasn't for the bangin DJ and music, this place would be empty. The wait staff needs to be trained in being a waiter. They automatically hit you for 18% gratuity whether it's one or more persons. If the tip is mandatory, GIVE GOOD SERVICE! They took forever to come to the table to get the drink orders. Instead we waited very long and we gave our entire order at that point. In any restaurant, the moment the guest sits, you take the drink order. No, not this one. If people have to sit and wait, take their drink order immediately.

Went on Saturday. Dope time~ went to celebrate a bday! Drinks were very good. Nice environment the DJ was great. Food was very good! They have Happy Hour , street parking.
I will definitely return. I had the guacamole and chips ,salmon with veggies in lobster sauce.

Amazing food and service! Had the best time on a Wednesday enjoying dinner and great drinks. The music and ambiance were 10 out of 10. I especially enjoyed the mofongo & passion fruit margarita. The owner Rob was extremely friendly and welcoming. Will definitely be back!

Had a great time at Agua √© Coco! The vibe was on point with a cool DJ spinning a mix of salsa and hip hop‚Äîsuch a perfect combo. I also caught a comedy show hosted by @laugh_con_jeffrey, which had everyone laughing and feeling good. The energy here is lively and fun. Definitely a great spot if you're looking to eat, vibe, and be entertained all in one place!

Agua e Coco is an amazing place, I love the food , music and service was absolutely amazing. Rob the owner is very welcoming and friendly also the server Mariela. Definitely a place you want to go and have fun with your friends and coworkers :)

Julissa was great and attentive to our needs. We came on a Monday and enjoyed happy hour! The calamari was nice and tender as were the shrimp in the tacos. Overall we plan to revisit and hope to have Julissa or someone with comparable service to her!!

This is the summer SPOT!! The food, the service, the  hookah, environment and the DRINKS are amazing !!!!!! Don‚Äôt take my word for it, come
Check it out, you won‚Äôt regret it !!!!

First time coming here from Brooklyn and met some friends. Drinks are a hit! Good strength and taste combined. And you got a variety of events that's showing on the screens. DJs had the tunes on point. Definitely a spot I can see myself at again

Not much of an appetizer selection but the atmosphere, great staff and drinks more than compensated. I had a great time here. Will be back to catch some sporting events just to enjoy the incredible screens displayed.

The omly reason I fave a one wss because theres no Zero! Had reservations theres no tables. Sat at the bar. No one can to tell us about a table , i asked tgen they started looking. Tgey stopped looking then I saw a table availalible abd ibquired, they said it was reserve. Finally I found my own table and tell the greeters. They said fine. We sat there for over 40 minutes chatting and finishing tge drinks ee biught at the bar. No one came over and asked us anything. We tried to stop a server and he said give him a minute. Again and hour and change and one came. No utensils napkins or even water was given. We got up and walked out. We ended up st Havana were it was also crowded  but at least we hot s tanle in 30 minutes and enjoyed a great meal. I will never recommend this pkace to anyone!

Flew in from DC for a great friend‚Äôs bday party and let me tell you that we had a BLAST üí•!!

The food was exquisite üî• - highly recommend anything on the menu - but the calamari y mofongo de camarones were TO DIE FOR.

Also had the ‚Äú99 problems‚Äù drink and it was delicious! What‚Äôs the secret?!

Shoutout Nate for your exceptional service. Looking forward to the next time we get to celebrate there!
Once you walk in there an amazing vibe.. starting with the waiters finishing with the dj and her performer.. the shows and advient makes people not want to leave.

Love this beautiful restaurant that gives sexy upscale, Amazon vibes. The greenery decor and black wall were stunning. It‚Äôs a large location with plenty of perfect seating available. It was raining when we visited so we sat inside for brunch from 1pm until 4pm. Our waitress was very pleasant friendly and tentative. Brunch is great with timed mimosas or sangrias included in their $34.99 deal. The portions I will say are small for sharing so order your own food.

Jennifer it‚Äôs the best bartender I have met . So nice so friendly so professional. So sweet and kind . She‚Äôs seems very hard working person who cares about her costumers . They are lucky having her . Every owner we love to have her at their bar

The worst experience on my birthday. They took so long to come to us and then when we finally ordered, the food took forever to get to us. The hookeros were more attentive than the servers. I ordered a drink and I received it like 30‚Ä¶
